text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo - Legion Y530 15.6" Laptop - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti - 1TB Hard Drive - Black 81FV0002US Notebook PC Computer Gaming is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo - Legion Y530 15.6" Laptop - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti - 1TB Hard Drive - Black 81FV0002US Notebook PC Computer Gaming is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Valorant. The build quality of the Lenovo - Legion Y530 15.6" Laptop - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti - 1TB Hard Drive - Black 81FV0002US Notebook PC Computer Gaming is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo - Legion Y530 15.6" Laptop - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti - 1TB Hard Drive - Black 81FV0002US Notebook PC Computer Gaming!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the Lenovo - Legion Y530 15.6" Laptop - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti - 1TB Hard Drive - Black 81FV0002US Notebook PC Computer Gaming is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
